newyearMessage: You're the happiest new year person!
fortuneMessage: While you hold the button, you're the luckiest person in the app
peaceMessage: While you hold the button, wars cease... on this screen.
newyearDefaultSubtitle: Hold the button to welcome the New Year!
newyearButtonText: May this New Year be unforgettable!
fortuneButtonText: Wealth is almost in your hands!
peaceButtonText: You are the Great Button Warrior!
prestigeButtonText: You are not like everyone else!
recordHeaderText: Share this to your friends! Let them know, that you are on the light side!
